chargeHist.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam Grayson Lee Wright was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam Grayson Lee Wright

records.addlTxt: Smith

10:31 AM Defendant Adam Grayson Lee Wright in court in custody with legal intern Olivia Long and attorney Kevin M Smith.  Emmeline Lee appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amended Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendant pleads no contest. Court finds the defendant guilty. Court orders 60 days jail. Court costs due September 2 2022. 60 days sentence credit; time served sentence.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 28, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Scheduling letter - attorney Smith
Initial Scheduling Order

09:52 AM Defendant Adam Grayson Lee Wright in court in custody by video with attorney Kevin M Smith by video.  Emmeline Lee appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Samantha Valencia sworn and testified by video. Stipulation as to identity of defendant for preliminary hearing.  State rests and moves for bind over.  Defense objects to bind over without argument.    Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information.  Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing on April 26, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Activity: initial appearance

03:06 PM  Defendant Adam Grayson Lee Wright in court in custody appearing by video with attorney Kevin M Smith with Legal intern Olivia Long appearing by video.  Emmeline Lee   and intern Margaret Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.   Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.   Signature bond set of $500.00   with conditions, No intentional contact with Deputy Valencia.  Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only.  Court orders Level 2 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Must comply with all mental health orders including taking all medications as prescribed. Adjourned initial appearance March 29, 2022 at 3:00 pm.
